name: Mexican Fiesta Salad
description: A refreshing Mexican-inspired salad with avocados and fresh tomatoes.
preparation: Score avocados in quarters lengthwise, and cut each in half lengthwise. Carefully remove pits, and peel off shells. Cut into wedges, and pile in the centre of a serving platter.
Sprinkle Guacamole Dip Mix overtop. Drizzle with oil and, using a 2-in-1 Citrus Press, juice limes overtop.
Season with Salt and Pepper. Serve immediately â€“ before avocados begin to brown.
tips: Health Tip: Tomatoes and avocados are a perfect good-for-you match. Both are great for heart health: tomatoes are rich in lycopene, and avocados are rich in healthy monosaturated fats.
